'''Minecraft Explorer''', also known as '''Minecraft Explorer Pro'''<ref>{{citation|url=https://apps.apple.com/us/app/minecraft-explorer-pro/id449354665|title=Minecraft Explorer Pro|website=
App Store}}</ref><ref>{{citation|url=https://www.57digital.co.uk/portfolio/minecraft-explorer-pro/index.html|title=Minecraft Explorer Pro|website=
57Digital}}</ref><ref>{{citation|url=https://appadvice.com/app/minecraft-explorer-pro/449354665|title=Minecraft Explorer Pro|website=
AppAdvice}} {{Archived link|https://web.archive.org/web/20250627022155/https://appadvice.com/app/minecraft-explorer-pro/449354665}}</ref>, '''Minecraft Explorer Pro HD'''<ref>{{citation|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20210729223621/https://apps.apple.com/us/app/id514593643|title=Minecraft Explorer Pro HD|website=
App Store}}</ref><ref>{{citation|url=https://appadvice.com/app/minecraft-explorer-pro-hd/514593643|title=Minecraft Explorer Pro HD|website=
AppAdvice}} {{Archived link|https://web.archive.org/web/20250627022156/https://appadvice.com/app/minecraft-explorer-pro-hd/514593643}}</ref>, and '''Minecraft Explorer Lite'''<ref>{{citation|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20150413200731/https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/minecraft-explorer-lite/id430384234?mt=8|title=Minecraft Explorer Lite|website=
App Store}}</ref><ref>{{citation|url=https://appadvice.com/app/minecraft-explorer-lite/430384234|title=Minecraft Explorer Lite|website=
AppAdvice}} {{Archived link|https://web.archive.org/web/20250627022154/https://appadvice.com/app/minecraft-explorer-lite/430384234}}</ref>, is a app for {{w|iOS}} developed by [[57Digital]] which was initially released in April 12, 2011 as a Lite version. It served as an official companion guide for the user,<ref>{{citation|url=https://mcupdate.tumblr.com/post/31269640713/supporting-minecraft-apps-on-ios|title=Supporting Minecraft Apps on iOS|website=
McUpdate}}</ref> allowing to look up hundreds of item recipes, search for items by name, check mobs, and overall had a similar function to the [[Minecraft Wiki]].

Although the app can still be purchased and downloaded, it lacks features and items from other updates, such as the [[Better Together Update]], [[Update Aquatic]], [[Texture Update]], and hasn't been updated ever since.

== Purchase and availability ==
[https://apps.apple.com/us/app/minecraft-explorer-pro/id449354665 Minecraft Explorer Pro] was available to buy on {{w|App Store}} for $2.99, but it has been taken down.

[https://web.archive.org/web/20210729223621/https://apps.apple.com/us/app/id514593643 Minecraft Explorer Pro HD] used to be on the App Store for $3.99, but it has been taken down

[https://web.archive.org/web/20150413200731/https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/minecraft-explorer-lite/id430384234?mt=8 Minecraft Explorer Lite] used to be on the App Store for free, but it has been taken down.

The app was available on the following platforms:
* iPhone<ref name=platform/>
